    • Method Detail

      • banPlayer

        public boolean banPlayer(String playerName,
                String senderName,
                String reason,
                Long banLength,
                boolean notify)
        Description copied from interface: BanHammerAPI
        Ban a player from the server and prevent them from logging in. If the player is online when they are banned they will be kicked.
        Specified by:
        banPlayer in interface BanHammerAPI
        Parameters:
        playerName - The name player that is to be banned
        senderName - The name of the person doing the banning. If called by a plugin without user intervention this should be the name of the plugin.
        reason - The reason why the player has been banned.
        notify - if true, players are not notified of the ban.
        Returns:
        true if the ban has been successfully created. Will return false if the player is already banned.

      • getPlayerBan

        public BanRecord getPlayerBan(String playerName)
        Description copied from interface: BanHammerAPI
        Get the details of any active ban associated with a player. This will only return details of an active ban, one that is preventing them from logging into the server. Previous bans will not be returned.
        Specified by:
        getPlayerBan in interface BanHammerAPI
        Returns:
        a CachedBan with the details of the active ban or null if no ban exists.

      • getPlayerBans

        public List<BanRecord> getPlayerBans(String playerName)
        Description copied from interface: BanHammerAPI
        Get the details of all bans associated with a specific player. This will provide a CachedBan providing access to all the related data, but no ability to change or modify the actual record.
        Specified by:
        getPlayerBans in interface BanHammerAPI
        Returns:
        a list with the details of all bans associated with the player. If no bans are on record, the list will be empty.

      • isPlayerBanned

        public boolean isPlayerBanned(String playerName)
        Description copied from interface: BanHammerAPI
        Check to see if a player is currently banned. This only checks to see if the player has an active ban, one that is preventing them from logging into the server. Previous bans are not taken into account.
        Specified by:
        isPlayerBanned in interface BanHammerAPI
        Returns:
        true if the player is currently banned, false if they are not.

      • pardonPlayer

        public boolean pardonPlayer(String playerName,
                   String senderName,
                   Boolean notify)
        Description copied from interface: BanHammerAPI
        Pardon a player (remove any active bans) and allow them to login once more.
        Specified by:
        pardonPlayer in interface BanHammerAPI
        senderName - - The name of the person doing the pardoning. If called by a plugin without user intervention this should be the name of the plugin.
        notify - - if true, players are not notified of the ban.
        Returns:
        true if the ban has been successfully repealed. Will return false if the player was not banned in the first place.
